title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Enhancing Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and experience in workplace information retrieval
context.additional_context: Customized program designed for learner-managers/leaders to strengthen information evaluation and utilization skills in workplace settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three criteria for identifying credible information sources.
Learners can apply at least two keyword strategies for efficiently retrieving work-related information.
Learners apply information management skills acquired through microlearning content at least once in actual work projects.
Learners use tools (e.g., fact-checking lists) to evaluate the credibility of information in digital environments with over 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
